data.text: @ca10024947 Thank you for the information Elena, we suggest you to delete your personal information through the public message, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Kind regards
@reperfiled2 Hola Jorge. Gracias por la información, estamos revisando para así brindarte respuesta en privado. Saludos.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Hemos respondido tu DM, solicitando más detalles de tu caso. ¿Podrías por favor revisar para poder asistirte? Gracias.
@MicaylaBrewster Hola Micayla, we are going to help you. Please send us your booking code in a DM (https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI) so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.
@pfonseca2016 Thank you Paulo, we have asked our colleagues for updates about your case; as soon as we hear back from them we will contact you again.
@AnaCoronad2 Hola Ana, como te indicamos en tu md, te han enviado respuesta a tu caso en fecha 29 de agosto y 11 de septiembre, saludos

@reperfiled2 Hola. ¿Podrías por favor, dejarnos saber el código de reclamación original a través de MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE) para que podamos revisarlo? Los códigos de reclamación de Iberia son similares a este ejemplo: E20160928-01234567. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@ChrisMalec13 Hola Chris, sorry for the delay. We'll contact the claims department and ask them to move on with your case. Apologies
@ca10024947 Hola Elena, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address, claim reference number and PIR number: https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@kmccann91 Hola Kieran, the voucher isn't related to your IBPlus account and there is no need to login in order to use it. Please send us a DM with your email address, Iberia Plus number and a screenshot from the error message https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@bark_mates We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. We'll get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update from the relevant department. Best regards
@bark_mates We'll contact the relevant department and ask them to review your case once again. Best regards

@bark_mates Hola, we're sorry to read this. According to our claims department, the flight delay was for 41 minutes, and you only missed the connection because the travel agency where you booked the flights didn't respect the minimum connection time. So please contact the travel agency

The countdown has started!! Iberia Maintenance team will be in London from 19th to 20th of October during upcoming MRO Europe 2022. Visit us at our booth #2339!  

#MROEU #iberiamaintenance https://t.co/8gtqujYCwV
@heyyeah Hola, how we can help you? do you mean the Iberia Plus login? If so, have you tried from the app? Let us know the details by DM. Thank you.
@pfonseca2016 Hola Paulo, could you confirm your complete name, booking code and email address? Thank you.
@luisant98926115 Hola Luis, sentimos mucho leer lo que comentas, cualquier consulta estamos a tu disposición. Saludos
@itsjacquieem Hola, we have sent you a reply to our conversation by DM. Regards.

@itsjacquieem Hola Jacquie, we are sorry to read what happened. Did you file the formal claim at counters?, Do you have a PIR code? Please send us a direct message with more details so we can follow up from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@chels__renee Hola Chelsea, have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us the details via direct message along with your full name as well so we'd be able to consult from here? Kind Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@jerusal49048417 Hola, hemos dado respuesta a tu DM, continuaremos la comunicación por ese medio, saludos.
@dangerclark Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Regards.
@juliaremache Hello. Please let us know all the details of your case. you can send us a Dm through the following link: https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI Kind regards.
@ChapinArnett Hello. We have sent you a new DM. kidn regards.

@ChapinArnett Hola Chapin,  could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@_its_just_jo Hola Jo. We suggest you to consult it directly with our colleagues at the airport desk so they can review your information and inform you on how to proceed. We also recommend you to be between 4 to 3 hours prior your flight (if long haul) , 3 to 2 hours if national. Kind regards.

@ehretana Hola, lamentamos la situación y continuamos en la búsqueda, te recordamos que puedes adquirir artículos de primera necesidad por los días que te encuentres sin tu equipaje. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@ehretana Hola, hemos respondido a tus DMs. Saludos.

@ehretana Hola Paisano. Lamentamos leer lo que nos dices. Para poder revisar, sería necesario conocer el código PIR de tu reporte, tu nombre como lo registraste en la reserva y tus datos de reserva. Por favor envía a través de mensaje directo (https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE). Saludos.
@ErimelT Hola Erimel. Hemos dado respuesta a tus MD's. Saludos.
@goforgin2 Hello. We're sorry you got that impression. We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards.
@claucastillo_10 Thank you very much. We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards.
@ErimelT Hola Erimel. ¿Podrías enviarnos un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB652lE) con todos los detalles al respecto de ésta situación, para poder revisar, por favor? Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@RetoKromer Hello. Thanks for confirming that information. From here we are at your disposal. Kind regards.

@RetoKromer Hola RetoKromer. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? If so, could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@Giulitta123 Hola Giulitta,  we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.

@eeeeebcux Hola cocolatina, could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@JaramilloMua Hola Daniella. ¿Has abierto un parte de irregularidad (PIR) en el aeropuerto? ¿Podrías enviarnos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE con tu nombre completo, los detalles al respecto y así lo podemos verificar desde aquí? 
Quedamos a disposición. Un saludo
@de49175371 Hola Debbie, we have replied to your DM, best regards.
@katnipeverdean Hola, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@Moken2012 Hola Jim, please send us a DM with your ticket number so we can have a look at it's current status. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@Joyce96938772 Hola Joyce, we would like you to let us know the route you wanted to acquire so we could review this information. Regards https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@willbeck1977 We'll contact the claims department and ask them to review your case and provide a new answer by email, in case needed, as we don't analyze complaints here on the social media team. Sorry for the inconvenience

domain.name: Movie
domain.description: A film like Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @willbeck1977 the outcome will be the same, because the compensation doesn't apply in this case. Apologies

@willbeck1977 Sorry to read this, Will. We can see that our claims department already analyzed your case more than once and they keep providing the same answer. We can ask them to review the case once again, but probably /1

@willbeck1977 Please try to click on ''continue'' at least 3 or 4 times. In case it doesn't work, we kindly ask you to clear all cookies from your browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device. Notice that you need to select ''assistance'' as claim type
@willbeck1977 Hola Will, sorry to read this. To bypass this error, you just need to keep clicking on ''continue''.

@annmcavoy Hola Annie, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address, IBPlus account number and the boarding pass related to the flight for which you haven't received the Avios https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Giulitta123 Thanks, Giulitta
@arielkot1 Hola Ariel, we have requested the corresponding data by DM to be able to assist you with your request, regards.
@NaAsperger In this case, you need to follow up through the DOT, as we cannot intervene on claims submitted through third parties. Sorry for any inconvenience. Best regards

@NaAsperger We're awfully sorry for the inconvenience, Nahuel. Your comments will be taken in consideration so we can improve the quality of our services at the airport. The final response to your claim was sent by email on october 4. Please check all folders, including the spam. Regards
@charlimouse73 Hola Charlotte, we're sorry to read this and have just replied to your DM. Best regards

@NaAsperger Sorry for any inconvenience. When a passport is left onboard, the correct procedure is to hand it to the local authorities at the airport. We're not able to allow passengers to go back to the aircraft and our crew cannot do this either, unfortunately. Kind regards
@Giulitta123 We've replied to your new DMs. Please check
@NaAsperger collect the passport that you left onboard. Please check all details on the email sent to you on october 4. Kind regards

@NaAsperger Hola Nahuel, sorry for the inconvenience. As explained on the private chat, your claim was replied by email on october 4. For safety and security reasons, passengers cannot return to the plane after disembarking. That's why you weren't allowed to get back to the aircraft to/1
@Giulitta123 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Kind regards

@Wilson_Soccer22 Hola , we suggest you to delete your cache and cookies of your browser and also try it through the incognito mode, please also share us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify all details. Kind regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@cultiv8tor Hola, we do not know the details of the incident you mention. Please let us know by DM all the information to review and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Sir_Faceless Hola, we are sorry to read your comments. Please let us know by MD if there is anything we can help you with from this department. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Chris10Foster Hola Chris, we have sent a response to your direct message requesting some details to be able to verify the information in your case. Kind regards.
@Sir_Faceless Hola, we're sorry to read what you tell us. Please send us more details about your case via DM so we can verify all the information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Amirajad2 Hola Amira, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have sent you a new DM. Please check
@renkemasander Hola Sander, we've just replied to your DM. Please check

@Giulitta123 Hola Giulitta, we're sorry to read this and would like to offer our apologies for any inconvenience that might have happened during your call. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and more details about the website issue when adding a bag https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@FeetRevolution Hola, please delete the tweet where you posted the booking code and avoid posting this kind of info on public chats. We kindly ask you to send us a DM with the booking code and your full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @traviswcolon Hola Travis, sorry for read this. Please send us a DM with your IBPlus account number, full name and email address. We also need a screenshot from the error message https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, sorry for the inconvenience. We can see that a payment was issued today and you should receive it within the next 30 days. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@Amirajad2 We arre sorry to read this Amira, we have replied your DM with details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@KristyMarsden Hola Kristy, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@KWALRULES Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all detail of your case ? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@WTXJET Hola perfect, we are glad to read your comment. Best regards.
@WTXJET Hola Michel, if we can help you by this means, please send us a DM. Regards.
@ben_indig Hola Ben. We replied to your DM. Regards.
@tablegrapenut Hola Jennifer. We are sorry for the inconvenience with your luggage if this time our service has not lived up to your expectations. Regards

@mlbastidas Hola Marialaura, desconocemos los detalles puntuales del caso ¿presentaste en el momento de los hechos el parte de irregularidad de equipaje PIR? y dado que pasaron 2 meses según indicas ¿enviaste ya algún tipo de documentación para el estudio de reembolso por extravío? Saludos
@Mr_Egg87 Hola Edgardo, we confirm that from here we have consulted internally for more details about your case. As soon as we have more information, we will contact you directly via DM. Regards.
@JeffOnore1 Hola Jeff, we responded to your direct message requesting some details to verify the information in your case. Regards.

@davidepirozzi1 Hola, please send us a direct message with the details of your case and the file number associated with your claim so that we can verify more details from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AnaCoronad2 Hola Ana, sentimos la demora en nuestra respuesta. Te hemos respondido tu MD. Saludos.

@Mr_Egg87 Our colleagues didn't have the bag's content list with the value of each item. Since you confirmed that you replied their email, we'll ask the claims department to move on with your case. Best regards
@onnebakker You're welcome, Onne :)

@onnebakker We kindly ask you to ignore these Twitter profiles that are asking you to contact someone on Instagram to recover the account. Such profiles don't belong to us and they probably just want your personal data.

data.text: @onnebakker Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with her full name, account number and email address. We also need your full name, account number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Mr_Egg87 Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please confirm if you replied the email sent by our claims department on october 3rd related to your baggage claim?
@maevewithXLsons Hola Maeve, we're deeply sorry. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and the claim reference number, which begins with an E https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jjhartings Hola Jack, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@NaAsperger We are checking your case internally, our legal team will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@AnneF60 Hola Anne, in order to follow the case, we will answer about the situation in the your son´s profile. Thank you.
@NaAsperger Hola Nahuel, we will follow your case in this profile, we appreciate your patience. Regards.
@KinseyZG Hola Kinsey, could you send us by DM the details please? We will help you from there. Regards.
@AnneF60 Hola Anne, we are very sorry for the situation, we will reply to your DM. Thank you.
@Amirajad2 Hola Amira, we have replied your DM with all details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

@Chumbler Hola Christopher, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking code, ticket number, registered email and the situation of your case to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@tablegrapenut Hola Jennifer, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your complaint including your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@goforgin2 Hola Federico, we are sorry to read this, we have previously sent you a DM with all details. Regards
@patchys_1 Hola Patch. If the booking and the claim is made with British Airways, you will need to consult directly with them. Kind regards.

data.text:
@clarence_fouche Hello Clarence. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@patchys_1 Hola Patch. As we informed you, in order to verify, we would need an Iberia ticket (i.e 075-23 / 075-14  #######) or a claim file (i.e 20220410-12345678) . Please check your information so we can consult from here. 
Regards,
